You can see a sofa. The sofa is comfy. Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?

You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is not blocked by one. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, there is no door.

-= Kitchen =-
You arrive in a kitchen. An usual one.

You can make out a fridge. You can see a closed conventional looking oven in the room. You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a table. The table is massive. On the table you can make out a knife. You can see a counter. The counter is vast. On the counter you can make out a raw purple potato, a raw yellow potato, a red hot pepper and a cookbook, so there's that. As if things weren't amazing enough already, you can even see a stove. But there isn't a thing on it.

There is a closed frosted-glass door leading north. There is a closed patio door leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is not blocked by one.
